metadata.title: CVE-2020-7720 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The package node-forge before 0.10.0 is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution via the util.setPath function. Note: Version 0.10.0 is a breaking change removing the vulnerable functions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-7720` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-node-forge - 0.10.0~dfsg-1
node-node-forge - 0.10.0~dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-node-forge package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.0~dfsg-1').
